WizardTD

类 Wave

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.Wave

  • public class Wave
extends java.lang.Object
    The game will be process in different waves. Each waves is different in time and monsters.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明
      Wave(int waveNumber, double duration, double preWavePause, java.util.HashMap<Monster,java.lang.Integer> monsterDict)

      Get the pre wave pause of the wave.
